Class DateFormatTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tsgrp.migration.transformation.AbstractTransformer
      • com.tsgrp.migration.transformation.DateFormatTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MappingSource

    public class DateFormatTransformer
extends AbstractTransformer
    Transformer to retrieve a string version of a date

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String[] getValue(java.lang.String args, MigrationNode node)
      Get the value of the source from the migration node TODO: Should return an object array, not a string array
      void setDatePatterns(java.lang.String[] value)
      Optional array of SimpleDateFormat patterns to use in date conversions; defaults to AttributeDateType#DATE_FORMAT.
      void setDefaultDate(java.lang.String value)
      Optional date to use in case a date cannot be formatted from a string; defaults to null.
      void setFormatStrings(boolean value)
      Optional boolean to indicate String values should attempted to be formatted; default is false.
      void setParseDateStrictly(boolean value)
      Optional boolean to indicate whether or not we should parse any date attributes strictly (parsing strictly requires the date string value to exactly match one of the chosen date patterns), default is false.
      void setStripCircaPrefix(boolean value)
      Optional boolean to indicate if a leading "c." should be stripped; default is false.
